title: Behind the code
sub_title: My mission is to bring people and technology together through programming and digital content — creating experiences that inspire, teach, and transform.

description.title: The road so far
description.begin: Nice to meet you! My name is Felipe Frantz Zanini, a software engineer passionate about jiu-jitsu, running, indie game development, Dota 2, screenwriting, pixel art, music, and investments. I am 31 years old and live in Pelotas, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.
description.middle: My journey in software development began in 2008, during technical school. In 2010, after completing the course, I started my first programming internship and have never stopped learning and evolving since. Upon being hired as a software engineer, I have taken part in more than 50 projects, using various technologies, with an emphasis on PHP.
description.education: Passionate about the field and always seeking to improve, I completed a Bachelor’s Degree in IT Management and a Specialization in IT Management. I have also begun a Master’s in Computer Science.
description.end: I currently work as a Senior Software Engineer & Frontend Architect at Iguatemi S.A, where I contribute to the development of innovative technological solutions that transform the digital experience for customers.

skills.title: From imagination to impact
skills.subtitle: A look at my process for turning ideas into digital products

process.title: Understanding the motivation
process.description: Everything starts with a good conversation. I listen to your ideas, understand your needs and motivations, translate that into something practical, and think about the best way to turn it into something visually appealing and functional.

process.title: Building the structure
process.description: Before focusing on appearance, I define the project structure: which pages are needed, how the elements will behave, and how everything will be connected in a logical and efficient way.

process.title: Bringing the code to life
process.description: Time to bring the project to life. I develop interfaces focused on usability, responsiveness, and performance. Each element is optimized to work well on any device, with fast loading and smooth navigation.

process.title: External integrations
process.description: When the project requires forms, authentication, or integration with other systems, I handle that as well — always with a focus on security, stability, and reliability.

process.title: Testing and quality assurance
process.description: Before going live, I run various tests to ensure everything works as planned — across different browsers, devices, resolutions, and usage contexts.

process.title: Time to show the world
process.description: To wrap it up, I publish the project and make everything ready for access. In the first few days, I monitor and provide support to address any issues that come up.

stack.title: The gears behind the process
stack.description: Behind every click and line of code are technologies chosen with care and purpose. If you would like to see the full stack or send a message, use the buttons below.

site.title: Coffee, code & deploy
site.subtitle: A technical summary of the technologies and tools that make this site mine — everything that happens behind the clicks.
site.description: This site was built using Mobile First concepts, with the Next.js framework, deployed on Vercel, styled with Tailwind, animated with Framer-Motion, and using icons from React Icons.
